name: lent knitalong blanket/celtic cross
notes:
(please note that the link above is to the welcome letter; the weekly documents can be found below.)

welcome to victoria methodist church's mystery lent knitalong for 2025!

now that this is no longer a mystery, we can reveal that the pattern is based on the 8th century celtic cross in kildalton, on the island of islay. for more details, see week 6 of the knitalong documents!

this year we will be knitting a textured blanket in chunky yarn (the pattern can also be knitted in dk weight yarn to make a wall hanging). the pattern is laid out in daily chunks, each day accompanied by a reflection/meditation, and will be released in weekly documents. 

all the details you need to get started, and information on how the knitalong will run are included in the welcome letter, along with patterns for two swatches to check your gauge and practise making bobbles if you would like to include those in your blanket. (a link to a video demonstrating these is also included).

the documents for weeks one to seven will be uploaded at the following link:

https://www.vic-methodist-bristol.org.uk/lent-knitalong-2025/
